description: Creates a simple poll with up to 25 options.
name: poll

options.description: The amount of options this poll can have (2-24)
options.name: options

options.description: The amount of votes each user can cast (max: options - 1) (default: 1)
options.name: votes

options.description: Your GitHub username.
options.name: username

description: Get the comments for a PR.
name: pr-comments

options.description: The PR number to register for.
options.name: pr

options.description: The owner of the repo.
options.name: owner

options.description: The repo name.
options.name: repo

options.description: A hex code to set your role color to.
options.name: hex

options.description: Add all people from a provided role to this thread.
options.name: add_role

options.description: Which role to add from
options.name: role

description: Configure the bot for your server.

options.description: Configure the breakout category.
options.name: breakout-category

options.name: category

options.name: list

options.description: Unset the current Breakout Rooms category
options.name: unset

options.name: forum-log

options.name: list

options.name: set

options.name: channel

options.description: List the configuration.
options.name: display

options.description: List the configuration.
options.name: do

options.description: Close breakout rooms and bring everyone back.

options.name: channel
